structure.unit: A UNIFORM MILITARY AND OVERSEAS VOTERS ACT

law.text:
A court may issue an injunction or grant other equitable relief appropriate to ensure substantial compliance with, or enforce, this chapter on application by:
A covered voter alleging a grievance under this chapter; or
An election official in the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 18, effective July 1, 2014.
